Message:
She started telling me her story.
“There’s nothing significant
about what I have to say.”

I fell into despair,
screaming that the world
should be destroyed.

Of course, I wasn’t serious.
It’s just what I thought at the time.”

“But, I did feel anger
for this asinine world.
That anger was real.”

“My wish was granted.
When I came to,
the entire city was gone.

My family, friends,
every single person
who lived there...
They had all turned to dust.”

“My murderous power changes
anything I touch into dust.”

“This is how my wish took shape.
Doesn’t fate have
a sick sense of humor?

I’m just an ugly monster
wearing the skin of a human.”

She laughed happily
after telling me her story.

Her heart was also broken,
but in a way that was
different than mine.
